website_summaries.verdict: Because it's designed for fondue, this unit keeps your candy melted at a temperature that's hot enough for melting, but won't burn you or the candy.
pros: Doesn't burn candy like a microwave can
Keeps candy melted but at a low temperature
cons: Small pot is best for 1 or 2 people at a time

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot more chocolate
customer_reviews.text: It’s just perfect. I make several kinds of chocolate dipped foods during the holidays...pretzels, etc. the smaller melters were such a hassle and I kept having to stop dipping to melt more chocolate. This melter holds at least 2, 8oz bags of chocolate and melts it quickly. Clean up is a breeze. It’s a real time saver and I’m really happy with it. I may not use it often, but when I do it really does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: G. Duynslager

customer_reviews.title: Good little warmer...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on Christmas Eve so guests could dip fruit or cookies into chocolate. Melts quickly & I used recipe adding cream & a sprinkle of clove. Guests loved it & It was easy to clean up. Holds approx 2 8oz bags of chips + a bit of cream mixed in. The only complaint I have with it is there is no top. This could be purposeful for an unknown reason, but I thought it would stay warmer & look nicer on the counter when using if it had one. Would recommend & I bet kids would love it :) (would also like to know if it is OK to melt cheese.... going to try it)
customer_reviews.author: Dacosta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect melter.
customer_reviews.text: This little chocolate melter has been so much fun for my 9 year old. She received this along with different kinds of melting wafers, candy molds and has made numerous batches of chocolates and chocolate pops to give as gifts. She has also dipped strawberries, pretzels, chips and other fruits. It is a good size for her to handle, doesn't get hot to the touch and is easy to clean. Win, win. Don't hesitate on this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Melts chocolate quickly around 109 degrees; then low temp setting keeps the chocolate around 91 degrees. Just perfect for dipping pretty much anything. Holds a lot of chocolate, 2 cups worth which is substantial for dipping. All the tools and accessories are a gimmick and pretty much worthless, but don't let that stop you from ordering this...

customer_reviews.title: Versatile little warming pot for small group
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pot for melting chocolate and then dipping (as in a chocolate fondue). It is small so probably fits a small group of 2 - 4 people. I wanted a small warming pot that could stay plugged in on the table to serve chili con queso and keep it warm. This worked well but would have been PERFECT if it had a lid. That way it would have stayed warm without having to be reheated from time to time. I like the non breakable insert; it cleans up very easily and the whole thing is small enough to store away without taking up much room.

product_meta.title: VonShef Fondue Pot, Electric Chocolate Melting Set, Chocolatier Warmer Includes Spatula, 10 Skewers & 10 Forks For Dipping Candy, 2 Heat Settings for Easy Melting (Red)
product_meta.description:
Dip to your heart’s delight. 

From its rich aroma to its smooth taste and texture, nothing is more pleasing to the senses than melted chocolate.

And when it’s gently bubbling away in a melting pot at your next dinner party? Well, there’s no guest on earth who’ll be able to resist.

Retro Chocolate Warmer

A Sweet Centerpiece. 

Along with a selection of marshmallows, strawberries, mini-doughnuts and other dip-sized delights, this chocolate fountain can take centre stage at any party, stunning guests with an indulgent fondue experience they’ll never forget.

Spatula. Stir chocolate easily.

10 forks. Great for easily and hygienically picking up treats

10 skewers. Stack treats onto a skewer and leave chocolate to set.

Easy to use. 

With low and high heat settings, simply turn on the machine, place your broken chocolate in the bowl and watch it melt. The bowl will remain at the temperature chosen to keep your chocolate melted for as long as you need.

Easy To Clean.

Melted chocolate is one of life’s most simple pleasures, so why should cleaning it up be complicated? The inner bowl is removable for easy cleaning.
